field.value: GetDataBindErrors parent ( or prefix ) key not propagated to nested objects

field.name: description
field.value:
The ARDataBinder prefix attribute is not propagated for nested elements inside the GetDataBindErrors(instance)[].Parent key.
Example:
Controller action: [ARDataBind("customer")] Customer customer
HTML: <input name="customer.name" value=""/> <input name="customer.Billing.address" value=""/>
Now if we get the errors for the customer object instance as such : GetDataBindErrors(customer) The error for name will have the following attribute: Key: customer.name Parent: customer
BUT the error for the billing address has the following key : Key: address Parent: Billing
Shouldn't the prefix "customer" be propagated to nested elements ? As in the parent for the Billing address should be customer.Billing ?
Please, this is my first JIRA post ever, so dont be too rough if i left things out!! :P
Oh and thanks for the wonderful project.
